overview.title:
Rejoignez la fidélité Paras et
 obtenez d'excellentes récompenses!
overview.desc:
La fidélité Paras est un programme spécial créé pour
apprécier les 'stakers' $PARAS en donnant un accès exclusif
à des tirages au sort limités.
overview.paras_loyalty_terms: Conditions générales de la fidélité Paras <Link>Termes & Conditions</Link>

rewards.from_paras_top_coll: NFTs des Meilleures Collections de Paras
rewards.from_paras_new_coll: NFTs des Nouvelles Collections de Paras

leaderboard.coming_soon_desc: Le classement des 'staking' bloqués sera affiché lorsque la période de fidélité commencera.
leaderboard.desc: Ce classement des 'stakings' bloqués n'est PAS une liste de gagnants. Les gagnants seront choisis au hasard par tirage au sort. Plus votre point de tirage au sort est élevé, plus vos chances de gagner sont grandes.

table.total_raffle_point: Point de tirage au sort total

leaderboard.only_user: Seuls les utilisateurs enregistrés pour le tirage au sort sont affichés sur ce classement.
leaderboard.click_here: Cliquez <Link>ici</Link> pour le tutoriel d'inscription au tirage au sort.

mechanism.title: Processus du programme de fidélité

cycle_1.title: Le niveau de fidélité sera déterminé en fonction de la quantité de $PARAS bloquée et de la durée du 'staking' bloqué.
cycle_1.desc: Les utilisateurs qui 'stake' des $PARAS sans les bloquer seront considérés comme étant au niveau Bronze. En savoir plus sur comment effectuer 'staking' bloqué.<Link>ici</Link>

info.title: Si les utilisateurs au niveau Argent, Or ou Platine bloquent pendant 90 jours, ils obtiendront un point supplémentaire:
info.desc: 25% du montant de 'staking' bloqué de l'utilisateur.

cycle_2.title: Les membres Argent, Or et Platine auront la possibilité de s'inscrire et de participer à un tirage au sort exclusif pendant la période du programme de fidélité.
cycle_2.desc_1: Les membres Argent, Or et Platine peuvent se connecter à <Link>Paras Marketplace</Link>, et s'inscrire au tirage au sort exclusif en cliquant sur une bannière contextuelle qui apparaîtra sur l'écran d'accueil.
cycle_2.desc_2: Si vous ne voyez pas la bannière contextuelle, vérifiez votre boîte de notification et recherchez l'annonce de tirage au sort. Cliquez sur 'S'inscrire' pour participer au tirage au sort exclusif.

cycle_3.title: Tous les membres Argent, Or et Platine qui ont signé pour le tirage au sort seront mis dans des groupes de tirage au sort séparés.
cycle_3.desc: Plus vous bloquez de $PARAS et plus la durée de votre 'staking' bloqué est longue, plus vos chances de gagner le tirage au sort sont élevées.

cycle_4.title: Each raffle pool will have different rewards.
cycle_4.desc: There are 3 rewards: $PARAS Token, NFTs from top collections & NFTs from new collections.

mechanism.please_check: Please check the <Link>Terms & Conditions of Paras Loyalty</Link>.
mechanism.join_paras_loyalty: Join Paras Loyalty & Get Excellent Reward!

1.title: "The more $PARAS you lock, the higher your probability of winning the raffle." How does this work? If I stake 6,000 $PARAS will I have a better chance than someone who stakes 3,000 $PARAS? Or is everyone with a Platinum seat equal, regardless of how much they stake past 3,000 Paras?
1.desc_1: The proportion of winning depends on how many $PARAS you stake. So, yes, the more you stake, the bigger your chance to win.
1.desc_2: We want to minimize the possibility of fraud, such as users creating multiple accounts to win the raffle. By doing this, we hope you can put your mind at ease and focus on managing 1 wallet for the Paras Loyalty.

2.title: Is there any benefit of locking for 90 days instead of 30 days?
2.desc: Yes. You will get additional raffle points of 25% of your total staking amount.

3.title: What does it mean to have a Bronze member badge?
3.desc: Bronze level is for users who lock less than 500 $PARAS.

4.title: I am a platinum member. How do I sign up for the raffles?
4.desc_1: You can check the raffle registration mechanism & period <Link>above.</Link>
4.desc_2: During each loyalty progra period, you will be able to sign up on a predetermined date.
4.desc_3: Silver, Gold, and Platinum members will receive a pop-up message or notification to sign up for the raffle during the registration period.

5.title: Do I have to do the flexible staking before locking my $PARAS?
5.desc: No, you can directly put the existing $PARAS in your wallet into locked staking without joining the flexible staking.

6.title: How do I claim the locked staking rewards?
6.desc: The amount of 'Claimable Rewards' on the staking page is an accumulation of your flexible staking and locked staking rewards. You can claim the rewards without unstaking your $PARAS.

social_media.title: If you have more questions, please reach out to our social media channels:

1.title: Loyalty level will be determined based on the amount of $PARAS locked staking & the locked staking duration.
1.desc: Users who lock $PARAS for 90 days will get additional raffle points of 25% of the user’s total staking amount.

2.title: Users who stake $PARAS without locking it will be considered Bronze level.

3.title: During the determined raffle registration period, Silver, Gold, and Platinum members will have a chance to sign up and enter an exclusive raffle.

4.title: Silver, Gold, and Platinum members can log in to Paras Marketplace, and sign up for the exclusive raffle through a pop-up banner on Paras homepage or a raffle registration notification.

5.title: Silver, Gold, and Platinum members have to click ‘Sign Up’ on the pop-up banner or the notification box to join the exclusive raffle.

6.title: Silver, Gold, and Platinum members who are eligible to join the raffle but do not click the ‘Sign Up’ button on the pop-up banner or the notification box will not be included in the raffle.

7.title: Users whose loyalty membership level drop after signing up for a raffle will be automatically enrolled in the raffle for their current level. However, if the users' membership level drops to Bronze, they will not be included in any raffle.

8.title: Silver and Gold members who top up their locked staking and level up during the raffle registration period are eligible to re-register for the higher level raffle. If they do not sign up for the new level, they will be automatically enrolled in the previous level (Silver or Gold).

9.title: 1 (one) user can only win 1 (one) raffle prize per month.

sub.1: Locked staking does not allow users to unlock before the end date of the locked staking period.
sub.2: When users top up the locked staking amount, the period will be reset.
sub.3: When users do not unstake their $PARAS after the locked staking period ends, the $PARAS will automatically move into flexible staking within 1x24 hours after the locked staking period ends.
sub.4: Users can do locked staking without reducing their $PARAS on the flexible staking by using the remaining $PARAS in their wallet.
sub.5: Users can directly put the existing $PARAS in their wallet into locked staking without joining the flexible staking.
sub.6: The amount of 'Claimable Rewards' on the staking page is an accumulation of flexible staking and locked staking rewards. Users can claim the rewards without unlocking $PARAS.

11.title: By participating in this program, you agree to the <Link>Terms & Conditions</Link> of Paras Loyalty.
